name: fastly-nextjs

scripts.fastly-serve: npm run fastly-build && cd next-compute-js && fastly compute serve --verbose
scripts.fastly-deploy: npm run fastly-build && cd next-compute-js && fastly compute publish --verbose

description: Next.js application with environment-based configuration. Uses .env.development for dev and .env.production for production builds. See README.md for environment variable setup.
